summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers." The text indicates a requirement to adhere to robots.txt rules and acknowledges rate limiting for the scraper's IP address. It directs the scraper to use the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download service (https://www.gpo.gov/fdsys/bulkdata/) for data acquisition. The bill appears to relate to accessing government data and likely aims to regulate automated web scraping activities.
